events.name: US and EU to pledge joint action on China concerns
events.wd_label: US and EU to pledge joint action on China concerns
events.wd_description: The US and EU will pledge joint action to address concerns about China's non-market practices and coordinate export controls on semiconductors and other goods at a meeting later this month.
events.description: The US and EU will pledge joint action to address concerns about China's non-market practices and coordinate export controls on semiconductors and other goods at a meeting later this month.

events.name: Upcoming meeting details
events.wd_description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, EU Vice-President Margarethe Vestager, and other senior officials will meet in Lulea, Sweden, on May 30-31 for the fourth edition of the EU-U.S. Trade and Technology Council (TTC).
events.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken, EU Vice-President Margarethe Vestager, and other senior officials will meet in Lulea, Sweden, on May 30-31 for the fourth edition of the EU-U.S. Trade and Technology Council (TTC).

events.name: Coordination on export controls
events.wd_description: They plan to coordinate controls on sensitive items, including goods with military use and semiconductors.
events.description: They plan to coordinate controls on sensitive items, including goods with military use and semiconductors.

events.name: Cooperation on information manipulation
events.wd_description: They aim to cooperate to counter foreign manipulation of information, including China's amplification of Russian disinformation narratives about the war in Ukraine.
events.description: They aim to cooperate to counter foreign manipulation of information, including China's amplification of Russian disinformation narratives about the war in Ukraine.

events.name: Russian air strikes on Ukrainian cities
events.wd_label: Russian air strikes on Ukrainian cities
events.wd_description: At least 25 people were confirmed dead after Russia launched a series of air strikes on cities across Ukraine, including Kyiv.
events.description: At least 25 people were confirmed dead after Russia launched a series of air strikes on cities across Ukraine, including Kyiv.

events.name: Casualties in Uman
events.wd_description: The attack on blocks of flats in Uman killed 23 people, including four children.
events.description: The attack on blocks of flats in Uman killed 23 people, including four children.

events.name: Casualties in Dnipro
events.wd_description: Another woman and her 3-year-old daughter were killed in the city of Dnipro.
events.description: Another woman and her 3-year-old daughter were killed in the city of Dnipro.

events.name: Rescue efforts and aftermath
events.wd_description: Rescuers and residents were seen working at the sites of the explosions, retrieving belongings, and fixing broken windows several hours after the attack.
events.description: Rescuers and residents were seen working at the sites of the explosions, retrieving belongings, and fixing broken windows several hours after the attack.

events.name: Russian defense ministry statement
events.wd_description: The Russian defense ministry claimed the strikes targeted Ukrainian army reserve units.
events.description: The Russian defense ministry claimed the strikes targeted Ukrainian army reserve units.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that the attack is evidence that further international actions are needed against Russia.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that the attack is evidence that further international actions are needed against Russia.

events.name: Alleged Russian strike in Dnipro
events.wd_description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.
events.description: An alleged Russian strike in a residential area of Dnipro, Ukraine, killed a two-year-old girl and left 22 people injured.

events.name: Details of the strike
events.wd_description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.
events.description: The girl's body was pulled from the rubble of a house in the Pidhorodneska community. Five of the injured were children, with three boys in critical condition.

events.name: Zelensky's response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky blamed Russia for the attack, describing it as deliberate, although Russia has previously denied targeting residential areas.

events.name: Explosions in Kyiv
events.wd_description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.
events.description: Explosions were heard in Kyiv, where the air defense system was activated again.

events.name: BMW's battery assembly plant in South Carolina
events.wd_label: BMW's battery assembly plant in South Carolina
events.wd_description: BMW Group's new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina, set to begin production in 2026, will be key to reducing logistics costs and risks in EV production.
events.description: BMW Group's new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina, set to begin production in 2026, will be key to reducing logistics costs and risks in EV production.

events.name: Plant groundbreaking
events.wd_description: Executives broke ground this week for the new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina.
events.description: Executives broke ground this week for the new battery assembly plant in Woodruff, South Carolina.

events.name: Role in supply chain
events.wd_description: The plant will be an important hub in an integrated, localized supply chain for electric vehicle production for BMW globally.
events.description: The plant will be an important hub in an integrated, localized supply chain for electric vehicle production for BMW globally.
